languages.text: Корабли в Просторе Коронус передают данные о неопознанной космической аномалии в системе Нармер-IV. Об этом явлении известно лишь то, что сам космос вокруг искривлен и нестабилен, а при приближении к аномальной зоне любое судно исчезает без следа.

Ships in the Koronus Expanse are reporting an unidentified space anomaly in the Narmer IV System. All that is known about this phenomenon is that space itself becomes warped and unstable around it, and any ship that approaches the anomaly zone disappears without a trace.
languages.original_text: Корабли в Просторе Коронус передают данные о неопознанной космической аномалии в системе Нармер-IV. Об этом явлении известно лишь то, что сам космос вокруг искривлен и нестабилен, а при приближении к аномальной зоне любое судно исчезает без следа.

traits.locale_text: Ships in the Koronus Expanse are reporting an unidentified space anomaly in the Narmer IV System. All that is known about this phenomenon is that space itself becomes warped and unstable around it, and any ship that approaches the anomaly zone disappears without a trace.

Ships in the Koronus Expanse are reporting an unidentified space anomaly in the Narmer IV System. All that is known about this phenomenon is that space itself becomes warped and unstable around it, and any ship that approaches the anomaly zone disappears without a trace.

Ships in the Koronus Expanse are reporting an unidentified space anomaly in the Narmer IV System. All that is known about this phenomenon is that space itself becomes warped and unstable around it, and any ship that approaches the anomaly zone disappears without a trace.

Ships in the Koronus Expanse are reporting an unidentified space anomaly in the Narmer IV System. All that is known about this phenomenon is that space itself becomes warped and unstable around it, and any ship that approaches the anomaly zone disappears without a trace.

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区的舰船发来了报告，说纳默四号星发生了不明空间异常。关于此次异常现象，唯一所知的情报就是目标区域周围的空间本身遭到了扭曲，变得极其不稳定，所有接近异常区域的飞船都消失得无影无踪。
languages.original_text: Ships in the Koronus Expanse are reporting an unidentified space anomaly in the Narmer IV System. All that is known about this phenomenon is that space itself becomes warped and unstable around it, and any ship that approaches the anomaly zone disappears without a trace.

traits.locale_text: 科罗努斯扩区的舰船发来了报告，说纳默四号星发生了不明空间异常。关于此次异常现象，唯一所知的情报就是目标区域周围的空间本身遭到了扭曲，变得极其不稳定，所有接近异常区域的飞船都消失得无影无踪。

languages.text: Plusieurs vaisseaux des Étendues de Koronus signalent une anomalie non identifiée dans le système de Narmer-IV. D'après leurs rapports, à cet endroit, l'espace se déforme et devient soudainement instable, et tous les vaisseaux qui se sont jusque-là approchés de l'anomalie ont disparu sans laisser de trace.
languages.original_text: Ships in the Koronus Expanse are reporting an unidentified space anomaly in the Narmer IV System. All that is known about this phenomenon is that space itself becomes warped and unstable around it, and any ship that approaches the anomaly zone disappears without a trace.

traits.locale_text: Plusieurs vaisseaux des Étendues de Koronus signalent une anomalie non identifiée dans le système de Narmer IV. D'après leurs rapports, à cet endroit, l'espace se déforme et devient soudainement instable, et tous les vaisseaux qui se sont jusque-là approchés de l'anomalie ont disparu sans laisser de trace.

languages.text: Las naves de la Extensión de Koronus informan de una anomalía no identificada en el sistema Narmer IV. Todo lo que sabemos del fenómeno es que distorsiona y desestabiliza el espacio a su alrededor y que cualquier nave que se acerca desaparece sin dejar rastro.
languages.original_text: Ships in the Koronus Expanse are reporting an unidentified space anomaly in the Narmer IV System. All that is known about this phenomenon is that space itself becomes warped and unstable around it, and any ship that approaches the anomaly zone disappears without a trace.

traits.locale_text: Las naves de la Extensión de Koronus informan de una anomalía no identificada en el sistema Narmer IV. Todo lo que sabemos del fenómeno es que distorsiona y desestabiliza el espacio a su alrededor y que cualquier nave que se acerca desaparece sin dejar rastro.

languages.text: コロヌス・エクスパンスの船がナルメル・IV星系で未確認の空間の異常を報告している。この現象について判明していることは、空間そのものが歪んで周囲が不安定になり、その異常宙域に近づくあらゆる船が跡形もなく消えてしまうということだけだ。
languages.original_text: Ships in the Koronus Expanse are reporting an unidentified space anomaly in the Narmer IV System. All that is known about this phenomenon is that space itself becomes warped and unstable around it, and any ship that approaches the anomaly zone disappears without a trace.

traits.locale_text: コロヌス・エクスパンスの船がナルメル・IV星系で未確認の空間の異常を報告している。この現象について判明していることは、空間そのものが歪んで周囲が不安定になり、その異常宙域に近づくあらゆる船が跡形もなく消えてしまうということだけだ。

languages.text: Schiffe in der Koronus-Ausdehnung berichten von einer unbekannten Raumanomalie im System Narmer IV. Man weiß über das Phänomen nur, dass der Raum selbst sich dort krümmt und instabil wird — und dass jedes Schiff, welches sich der Anomalie nähert, spurlos verschwindet.
languages.original_text: Ships in the Koronus Expanse are reporting an unidentified space anomaly in the Narmer IV System. All that is known about this phenomenon is that space itself becomes warped and unstable around it, and any ship that approaches the anomaly zone disappears without a trace.

traits.locale_text: Schiffe in der Koronus-Ausdehnung berichten von einer unbekannten Raumanomalie im System Narmer IV. Man weiß über das Phänomen nur, dass der Raum selbst sich dort krümmt und instabil wird — und dass jedes Schiff, welches sich der Anomalie nähert, spurlos verschwindet.

languages.text: Koronus Enginliği'ndeki gemiler, Narmer IV Sistemi'ndeki tanımlayamayan bir uzay anomalisine dair raporlar veriyor. Bu fenomene dair bilinen tek şey, direkt olarak çevresindeki uzayın çarpılmış ve kararsız olduğu ve anomali bölgesine yaklaşan tüm gemilerin iz bırakmadan ortadan kaybolduğu.
languages.original_text: Ships in the Koronus Expanse are reporting an unidentified space anomaly in the Narmer IV System. All that is known about this phenomenon is that space itself becomes warped and unstable around it, and any ship that approaches the anomaly zone disappears without a trace.
